Title: 1-900-LUCKY
Plot: Allison investigates the case a woman's murdered husband.  Meanwhile, her brother Michael gets a job as a telephone hotline psychic which leads him to visit a distressed customer in Arizona - the same customer whose case Allison is investigating.
GuestStars: Christopher McDonald, Warren Kole, Cindy Pickett, Dru Mouser, Andy Mackenzie, Deborah Offner, Ryan Hurst, Shashawnee Hall
